name: Baker Street Irregulars 1.0.6
description:
It is September 30, 1888. Sherlock Holmes in Dartmoor, Devon, discovered the evil plan of his rival Professor Moriarty. But it was too late for him to rush back to London. In order to protect London, he sent his Baker Street Irregulars to spread the news of the plan from house to house.

The responsibility of saving London is now focused on you.
